TopicTitle: Speed up Loading [Suggestion to Users, not Dev Team]

Articles.Content: I'm sorry if this was obvious to others, but I just had a discovery here. I was going through, messing with settings and had to restart KSP multiple times. I decided to see if it would be faster if I kept KSP on my faster hard drive rather than trying to load from a flash drive every time. There is a noticeable difference based on the read speed of whatever you are loading the game from. Those of you with SSD's are lucky, but even going to a 7200RPM hard drive is a massive improvement over trying to load from a USB stick.

I hadn't considered running KSP from a thumb drive but yes, they are slow
